title: Bestselling Rottnest Island Beachside Eco-Glamping with Daily Breakfast & A$50 Dining Credit
description:
Indulge your senses and inner nature enthusiast with a beachside glamping stay at the serene Discovery Resorts - Rottnest Island. Nestled behind the dunes of the iconic Pinky Beach, just off the coast of Perth, a natural, eco-friendly oasis awaits.

Sleep (almost) under the stars in a safari-style glamping tent and take the opportunity to disconnect from the world as you discover the 63 white-sand beaches, 20 crystal-clear bays and unique native wildlife of Rottnest Island. This tranquil beachfront haven - home to 83 safari-style eco-tents - invites you to discover the island’s simple pleasures as you reconnect with nature.

White sand, clear waters, coral reefs, passing dolphin pods, adorable quokkas and alfresco dining amid native bushland are the attractions that make up this 20-million-dollar glamping resort. Roam through nature, discover rich cultural heritage, explore nearby beaches and swim and snorkel in pristine waters. 

Spend your days beach-hopping, taking snaps with the world’s happiest animals, dining on the locally-inspired fare at Pinky's Rottnest Island and sampling a terrific selection of West Australian wines from the pool bar, before returning to your private sanctuary, built upon the dunes between enormous native trees.
offer_address: Strue Road, Rottnest Island, Western Australia 6161, Australia

title: Brand-New Glamping Getaway on Beautiful Rottnest Island
description: Imagine glittering blue waters, stunning native greenery and a laidback atmosphere on one of Australia’s most incredible islands. You’ll find all that and more with a getaway at Discovery Rottnest Island, a brand-new eco-friendly glamping experience nestled behind beautiful Pinky Beach. Here, you will be able to experience a truly unique escape on Rottnest Island, where you can walk on sandy beaches, explore picturesque forests and even take a selfie with a new furry friend! Embark on an unforgettable adventure and reconnect with nature at Discovery Rottnest Island, where you will enjoy daily breakfast at Pinky’s Beach Club, included ferry transfers from Fremantle, an exclusive Experience Passport and a guaranteed 12pm late checkout.
offer_address: Strue Road, Rottnest Island, Western Australia 6161, Australia

title: Perth or Fremantle: Rottnest Express Ferry & Self-Guided Island Tour with Bike & Snorkelling Equipment Hire
description: Board the Rottnest Express and explore the natural beauty, spectacular marine life and rich history of Rottnest Island, with a self-guided experience perfect for those looking to explore 'Rotto' at their own pace. Wander through secluded coves, stroll across impossibly white sands, snorkel through technicolour coral fields and meet Rottnest’s abundance of unique wildlife, including the impossibly adorable quokka. This experience includes everything you need the make the most of your day in paradise, including bicycle with helmet and snorkelling equipment hire. Cycle to Wadjemup Lighthouse for stunning panoramic views of distant Perth, explore the island’s picturesque historic settlement or simply lie back and enjoy some of the finest beaches in the world.

title: Rottnest Island Eco-Glamping with Daily Breakfast & Return Ferry Transfers
description:
Nestled behind the dunes of the iconic Pinky Beach, just off the coast of Perth, a natural oasis awaits at the eco-sustainable Discovery Rottnest Island. Sleep (almost) under the stars in a safari-style glamping tent at this secluded beachside park and discover a place where you can walk along 63 pristine beaches, swim in translucent waters, dive beneath the surface into breathtaking coral gardens and maybe even get a selfie with a local quokka.

Experience a truly unique, environmentally friendly stay on the edge of Pinky Beach and enjoy an unmissable Rottnest Island escape with daily à la carte breakfast at Pinky’s Beach Club, return ferry transfers from your choice of either Perth or Fremantle (includes Rottnest Island Authority Fee) with complimentary luggage transfer to Discovery Rottnest Island and complimentary bike hire during your stay so you can explore the island.

**Travelling with family?** Choose the Family Upgrade, valid for two adults and two children (aged 16 years and under).

**This deal has no admission fees**: Arrive in style with return ferry transfers and the Rottnest Island Authority Fee included at no additional cost.
offer_address: Strue Road, Rottnest Island, Western Australia 6161, Australia
